body: Oi Josuke! Some doujin artist used my stand name,『Za Hando』 as his doujinshi's cover name, Ain't that wacky? That's not something you see everyday!

(after seeing this)

"will he ever be the same doctor?"
"nien, he brain retard"
How come there isn't a 'Super Smash Bros' tag here considering this is supposed to focus on that game?
